entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
